trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" />, and <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" /> events raised for component-level events.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" />, <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" /> e <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" /> generati per gli eventi a livello di componente.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventHandler>, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates registering a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventHandler> and handling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> events.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come registrare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventHandler> e la gestione di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> eventi.
